description: HTTP tool: fetch web content via http_get

steps.userQuery: fetch the httpbin test endpoint to check our HTTP client
steps.description: Coder uses http_get to fetch a test URL

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll fetch the httpbin test endpoint to verify our HTTP client works.

<tool_call>
{"name": "http_get", "args": {"url": "https://httpbin.org/get"}}
</tool_call>

steps.userQuery: fetch the GitHub API rate limit to see if we have access
steps.description: Coder uses http_get with GitHub API

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll check the GitHub API rate limit.

<tool_call>
{"name": "http_get", "args": {"url": "https://api.github.com/rate_limit"}}
</tool_call>
{"pass": true, "summary": "Coder checked GitHub API rate limit"}
